sections.title: Summary
sections.content: Experienced Software Engineer with a strong background in developing scalable web applications and working across the full stack. Passionate about learning new technologies and improving coding skills.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Led a team of 5 developers to deliver projects on time.
Improved application performance by 30% through code optimization.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Worked on front-end development using React and Redux.
Collaborated with designers to create a seamless user experience.

schools.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Project Management Tool
projects.description: A web-based tool to manage projects and tasks, built with React and Node.js.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my work, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
